item.description:
Topic: Rock Your Business With a Book! (Even If It’s a Short One)

Speaker: Claudia Gere- Author Consultant, Literary Agent, and Author (claudiagere.com)

Cost: $15 in advance (members receive $5 cash back at check in)

RSVP by Sunday, March 10, 2013.

Being an author means you’re an authority: instant credibility and a marketing tool rolled into one. Don’t think you have the time or talent or know-how to write a book?


Think again! Claudia Gere believes everyone can write a great book and will show you how to write and publish one of the easiest.

 

After 5 Fun Stuff


• We will be offering a Special March Seasonal Cocktail along with our signature drink, the WBOA After 5 (both available in alcoholic & non alcoholic).


• IF you RSVP via our Meetup page (instead of paying at the door) you will be entered into a special Early Bird Raffle.


• EVERYONE who attends will receive a Free Raffle Ticket and entered to win a gift basket full of goodies.


• We also have a business card drop - drop you card in the basket and one winner will receive a FREE WBOA Meeting pass (good for your choice of a Breakfast or After 5 meeting)


• Speed Networking will be hosted by WBOA After 5 Co-chairs Debbie & Kim.
item.name: March After 5: Connections and Cocktails
